title: Eternal wisdom
body: I was at a party once dancing, and somebody close to me said 'Embarrassment is an underexplored emotion, go out there and make a fool of yourself.'

title: oopsie daysie
body: lurked in a random stream for 2 hours where the guy & his chat were only speaking mandarin. I wanted to be nice so I translate 'you play well!' in his chat & he said 'you know you can just speak english' in the most perfect english ive ever heard & now im a copypasta in his chat

title: CS2 be buggin
body: As someone who's been pregnant twice and had a trade reverse... Let me just say, I'd rather get pregnant a third time than have another trade reversed

title: little bit of trolling
body: Whenever I am introduced to an Asian person I do a deep formal bow.  It makes them visibly uncomfortable but they can’t say anything because they think I mean well.  I don’t.

title: no peace
body: My friend believes all body disorder originates in the psyche, so if anything is even slightly wrong with me he takes out a huge book, looks it up and asks 'did [specific event] just happen to you?' and the answer is always yes. 10/10 the most annoying thing ive ever experienced.

title: broke is woke
body: Hired a financial advisor and his first piece of advice was that I don't make nearly enough money to justify paying a financial advisor
